footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
pastEventsSubtitle: Relive the energy of our past encounters
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, traditionally used by indigenous communities for healing and spiritual exploration. It is prepared by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis).
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The Chacruna leaves contain DMT, a powerful psychoactive compound, while the Ayahuasca vine contains harmala alkaloids that act as MAO inhibitors. This combination allows the DMT to be active when ingested, opening the doors to a profound visionary and introspective experience.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is not a drug, but a spiritual tool that, when used with respect and proper guidance, can facilitate deep emotional, mental, and spiritual healing. It helps release limiting patterns, connect with your higher self, and understand your purpose in life.
benefitClarityDescription: It allows you to see your life from a new perspective, providing clarity on personal conflicts and helping you find solutions.
benefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the processing of deep traumas and repressed emotions, freeing you from emotional burdens and promoting inner peace.
benefitConnectionDescription: Many experience a deep connection with the universe, nature, and their own spirituality, leading to a greater sense of purpose and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive environment, group ceremonies allow you to share the energy of healing with other participants, creating a sense of community and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies where you can work directly with our guides on your specific intentions.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about the history, components, and sacred use of Ayahuasca as a tool for healing and spiritual connection.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey, providing a safe and supportive space.
preparationCtaDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. Access your personalized guide to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the experience.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, receive inspiring content, and be part of our healing community.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our guides are the heart of The Art of Healing. With years of experience and a deep connection to ancestral medicine, they are here to support you with love, respect, and wisdom at every step of your journey. Each one brings a unique energy, ensuring a safe, contained, and profoundly transformative experience.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.

chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all users of the platform.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the medical and intention questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire has been submitted by this user yet.
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: [LINK]
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: [LINK]
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
themeCustomizationDescription: Customize the application's color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of your Firestore data (users, ceremonies, etc.) as a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action is irreversible. It will overwrite all current data in the database with the content of the selected file. A backup of the current state will be created automatically before importing.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been restored from the file.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was created before your last import. You can roll back to the state before the import if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data from before the last import? This will overwrite any changes made since then.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its pre-import state.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Add one to get started!
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to view the plans for this ceremony.

selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please either select a video file to upload or enter a video URL.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your journey.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication? (especially antidepressants like SSRIs or MAOIs)
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with psychoactive substances or spiritual plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Briefly describe your most relevant experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve, heal, or understand...
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view the content of this section.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies.
preparationPageTitle: The Sacred Path: Your Guide to Preparation
preparationProcessDescription: Understanding the stages of the journey: preparation, the ceremony itself, the experience, and integration.
ceremonyProcessDescription: What to expect during the sacred ritual, from opening to closing.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigating the visions, emotions, and insights that may arise during your journey.
integrationProcessDescription: How to incorporate the lessons and healing from the ceremony into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, it is crucial to prepare your body.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Create a calm and receptive inner state.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The medicine can bring up deep emotions. The key is to surrender and trust the process. Do not resist what comes up; observe it with compassion. Our guides will be there to support you. Remember that every tear and every insight is a step towards your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort.
comfortItemsList: A blanket and a pillow or cushion
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList: An open mind and a respectful heart
A change of clothes for the morning
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the steps of your preparation guide. You are now ready to embark on this sacred journey. Trust the process, trust the medicine, and trust yourself.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Here you can consult all the information from your preparation guide at any time.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide chatbot.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review and manage system-generated error logs.
systemLogsDescription: List of errors captured by the system.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
analyticsDescription: View statistics on user interaction with different sections of the site.
noAnalyticsData: No analytics data has been recorded yet.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click-tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
